actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fishermen's Protective Act of 1967 in order to strengthen the import restrictions which may be imposed to deter foreign countries from conducting fishing operations which adversely affect international fishery conservation programs.

summary.text: Amends the Fishermen's Protective Act of 1967 to authorize the President to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to prohibit the importation of any or all products from countries engaged in fishing operations which adversely affect international fishery conservation programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fishermen's Protective Act of 1967 in order to strengthen the import restrictions which may be imposed to deter foreign countries from conducting fishing operations which adversely affect international fishery conservation programs.
